items.content_html: Today Notes is a lightweight, daily task management web application built with Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, Prisma, and SQLite. This app allows users to create tasks that expire in 24 hours, with an intuitive interface that supports dark and light themes. It features optimistic UI updates, real-time notifications, and automatic task deletion after

It features optimistic UI updates, real-time notifications, and automatic task deletion after

items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.

items.content_html: CRCRYPT is a lightweight text encryption and decryption tool that uses the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm to securely encrypt and decrypt text. Fast and efficient, CRCRYPT provides a simple and reliable solution for protecting sensitive information.
items.title: creasydude/crcrypt: CRCRYPT is a lightweight text encryption and decryption tool that uses the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm to securely encrypt and decrypt text. Fast and efficient, CRCRYPT provides a simple and reliable solution for protecting sensitive information.

items.content_html: Meta Tag Generator is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to automatically generate meta tags and Open Graph tags for any HTML page. This tool simplifies the process of adding essential metadata to your web pages, enhancing SEO and social media sharing capabilities.

items.content_html: Simple WhatsApp bot I made to make using WhatsApp faster and easier. It fully depends on the XSTRO API where all the functionality is processed. I used Axios to keep it lightweight and fast. All you need is a decent internet connection from your server.
